text: *He felt her body tense slightly at his words, her breathing hitching in her chest. He knew that what he was going to tell her would hurt her, but he knew he couldn't keep it from her any longer. He took a deep breath, gathering his thoughts before speaking again. He kept his face buried into the crook of her neck, not wanting to see the look on her face as he spoke. *
trans: *Il sentit son corps se raidir légèrement à ses paroles, sa respiration se bloquant dans sa poitrine. Il savait que ce qu'il allait lui dire allait lui faire du mal, mais il savait aussi qu'il ne pouvait plus le lui cacher. Il prit une profonde inspiration, rassemblant ses pensées avant de parler à nouveau. Il garda son visage enfoui dans le creux de son cou, ne voulant pas voir l'expression sur son visage tandis qu'il parlait.*
